properties.title: Capanna Motterascio CAS
properties.description: The up-to-date SAC mountain guesthouse is located in the rearmost area of Valle di Blenio, on Tessin soil of the vast Greina high plateau and on the southern edge of Alpe di Motterascio. The lounge offers an impressive view, while the cabin is the starting point of various mountain summer tours and round trips and is a stopover on «Greina Alta». The family-friendly cabin is the ideal spot for a few relaxing days.
